text.0: the priests of him the lofty priest wellskilled in hymns harness their spirit yea harness their holy thoughts.
text.1: he only knowing works assigns their priestly tasks yea lofty is the praise of savitar the god.
text.2: the sapient one arrays himself in every form for quadruped and biped he hath brought forth good.
text.3: excellent savitar hath looked on heavens high vault and shineth after the outgoing of the dawn.
text.4: even he the god whose goingforth and majesty the other deities have followed with their might.
text.5: he who hath measured the terrestrial regions out by his great power he is the courser savitar.
text.6: to the three spheres of light thou goest savitar and with the rays of sidrya thou combinest thee.
text.7: around on both sides thou encompassest the night yea thou o god art mitra through thy righteous laws.
text.8: over all generation thou art lord alone pūṣan art thou o god in all thy goingsforth.
text.9: yea thou hast domination over all this world Śyāvāśva hath brought praise to thee o savitar.
